markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Zombie Chuul](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2063)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 33

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Zombie Chuul](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2063)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Amphibious" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=207" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
<trait label="Zombie" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=245" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #182: Graveclaw](/Sources.aspx?ID=143) pg. 33</row>

**Perception** +11; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +18, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** +0

**Con** +6

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -1
</row>

**Slow** The zombie chuul is permanently [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) and can't use reactions.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +18 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +13 

</row>

**HP** 200
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Weaknesses**
[positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) 15, slashing 15

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, swim 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +18 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d12+12 slashing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**[Constrict](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=10)** <actions string="Single Action" />  1d12+7 bludgeoning, DC 25 (grabbed by claw only)

**Mandibles** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** A creature is grabbed and paralyzed by the zombie chuul's tentacles; Effect The creature takes 3d6 piercing damage.

**Paralytic Venom**  ([Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 25 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28) (1 round)

**Tentacle Transfer** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The zombie chuul has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20); **Effect** The zombie chuul transfers the grabbed creature from its claws to its tentacles, or vice versa. The creature is exposed to the zombie chuul's paralytic venom when transferred into the tentacles and at the start of each of the zombie chuul's turns if it remains grabbed by the tentacles.

</column>
name: Zombie Chuul

Paralytic Venom (Incapacitation, Poison) Saving Throw DC 25 Fortitude; Maximum Duration 6 rounds; Stage 1 paralyzed (1 round) Tentacle Transfer Single Action Requirements The zombie chuul has a creature grabbed; Effect The zombie chuul transfers the grabbed creature from its claws to its tentacles, or vice versa. The creature is exposed to the zombie chuul's paralytic venom when transferred into the tentacles and at the start of each of the zombie chuul's turns if it remains grabbed by the tentacles.
